actions.committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

official_title: To amend title XIX of the Social Security Act to require 12-month continuous coverage for children under Medicaid.
short_title: Ensuring Continuous Medicaid Coverage for Children Act of 2009

summary.text: Ensuring Continuous Medicaid Coverage for Children Act of 2009 - Amends title XIX (Medicaid) of the Social Security Act to change from discretionary to mandatory the authority of state Medicaid plans to provide for 12-month continuous coverage of children under Medicaid.

titles.title: Ensuring Continuous Medicaid Coverage for Children Act of 2009
To amend title XIX of the Social Security Act to require 12-month continuous coverage for children under Medicaid.
